programme.desc: Francis is a 115-year-old Yiddish vampire who roams the American backroads in his beat-up muscle car, keeping to himself, and liking it that way. One day, he meets a feisty teenager who claims she's his daughter, and she has the fangs to prove it.

programme.title: Boys from County Hell
programme.desc: Some hardy road workers, led by a bickering father and son, must survive the night when they accidentally awaken an ancient Irish vampire.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: Louis de Pointe du Lac lives in 1910 New Orleans as executor-in-charge of his family's fortune; when he meets the vampire Lestat, Louis' life begins to unravel in otherworldly ways; in 2020, Louis tells his story to journalist Daniel Molloy.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.sub-title: ...After the Phantoms of Your Former Self
programme.desc: Beginning his life as a vampire, Louis learns the rules of vampirism from his maker and companion Lestat; Louis discovers increasing differences between himself and Lestat; in Dubai, Louis reveals more of his modern-day vampire lifestyle to Molloy.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.sub-title: Is My Very Nature That of the Devil
programme.desc: Louis continues his life as a businessman of Storyville; when an old friend comes to town, Louis' relationship with Lestat is tested; Louis' business intertwines with growing tensions in New Orleans, leading to a new chapter in Louis' vampire life.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.sub-title: ...The Ruthless Pursuit of Blood With All a Child's Demanding
programme.desc: Claudia's transformation into a vampire teen completely changes Louis and Lestat's lives; as Claudia asks more questions, Louis and Lestat are forced to confront questions about making a teen vampire; Claudia learns dark realities of her new life.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.sub-title: A Vile Hunger for Your Hammering Heart
programme.desc: Claudia's activities and curiosities present continued challenges for Louis and Lestat; her actions light an explosive fuse.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.sub-title: Like Angels Put in Hell by God
programme.desc: Lestat attempts to make amends with Louis; the vampire family decides to live together once more; a surprising action from Lestat leads the family to decide to leave New Orleans, once and for all; in Dubai, Molloy has a shocking realization.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: The vampire family plans to leave town after a big Mardi Gras ball; Claudia and Louis operate outside of Lestat's knowledge; in Dubai, Louis reveals a new element to the interview that changes everything.

programme.title: Paco Gento
programme.desc: Paco Gento to legendarny piłkarz Realu Madryt, który w ekipie Królewskich spędził blisko dwadzieścia lat. Przyczynił się do wywalczenia dwunastu tytułów mistrza kraju i sześciu Pucharów Europy.

programme.title: Ronaldo
programme.desc: Biografia Luisa Nazario de Limy. Piłkarski idol początkowo święcił triumfy w barwach FC Barcelony. Potem grał m.in. dla Realu Madryt. Ma w dorobku tytuł mistrza świata za wygranie mundialu w 2002 r.
